reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, comfortable, and appreciate its color block design. They describe it as super soft and thick, with a nice fit, and one customer notes it's not overly baggy. While some it runs true to size, others mention it runs a little big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and soft
items.body: Nice material, soft. Color (solid green) is as shown. It runs a little big, but it’s also meant to be the big relaxed style. I’m 135 lbs, 5” 7’ and I got the medium. I could also have worn a small in this, but I think either would have been fine due to the relaxed fit of the sweatshirt. I also night the multi-colored pink one. It’s a different material than the solid colors. Still nice, but not as soft as the solid colors. Read more
items.author: Raymond Palmer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable and Versatile
items.body: I love this. It’s well made and looks exactly like the photo. Perfect with a flowy skirt and boots, jeans, or dressy pants. I really like this brand. Read more
items.author: Georgia Purvis

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable style
items.body: Love love love this sweater. Material is soft, fit is flattering for all body types. Bought it as a last minute sweater for a party and it was such a hit. Lots of compliments. Read more
items.author: A.johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Comfy & Cute!
items.body: Fits true to size and very soft…perfect for sweater weather:) Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The PERFECT sweater
items.body: Im absolutely in love with this color lock sweater. Its not too thick or too thin. I am usually a size XL but sized down after reviews and i wouldnt change that at all. Its still has the perfect amount of oversiziness without looking bulky. The material is soft and kept me warm in a cold office. I have so many dokotoo items and I love all of them. When im looking for a certain item... i always go to dokotoo first!! Read more
items.author: Richard and Amanda Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised
items.body: I purchased this top in a size medium I am 5'2 between 135-140 top is loose and over sized. I hang to dry i feel they would shrink if not. Love the slouch arms and length. I purchased the navy one as well in a medium and had to return due to sizing was different. Needed to go up in size to have it make a medium fit like the coral tan and brown... no smell when it arrived and nice heavy material Read more
items.author: Ray Martin Music

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft not itchy
items.body: Great sweater not itchy good comfy sweater! Read more
items.author: Kristi Martin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent
items.body: cute but worn twice but has a tendency to ball up a bit already- should've gotten a medium but like the sweater -not too light and not too heavy Read more
items.author: Sarah kane

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z Burgundy 1, Gray, Jungle Green, Z Vineyard Green 1, Grapefruit Orange, Z Violet 1, Z Black 1, Coffee, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Z Rose Red 1, Pink, Z Dark Khaki 1, Z Dark Green 1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
